ATuin

Class Turtle

  • java.lang.Object
    • ATuin.Turtle
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    TubeTurtle

    public abstract class Turtle
extends java.lang.Object
    Default class of a turtle interpretation. This class factorise the differents turtle interpretation. If you wish to create a new turtle interpretation you should extends this class and implements its methods.
    Author:
    Caelum

      • checkSymbols

        public abstract boolean checkSymbols()
        Checks if the interpretation can interpret all the symbols.
        Returns:
        true if all is ok, false if all symbols can't be interpreted
